name: Cosmic Monsters
description:
Experience your Cosmic Monsters adventure as "Victor" in the Kraiga region!
The mighty and dark enclave tries to manipulate the sweet Cosmic Monsters for their evil machinations, yours
The task is to stop them!
In addition, you can win 9 medals in arenas in the region and finally take part in the regional league to prove yours!

Pack up your backpack and race in Cosmic Monsters!

Info: With the proceeds from Cosmic Monsters I want to buy the property that was expropriated from our family many years ago in beautiful Scotland, help me and my family and we are indebted to you.
